### 2024 CFP Prediction Model

Below are the results of 10,000 Monte Carlo simulations of the 2024 CFP. We'll update the simulation model after each game is played.

Here we see the CFP simulation results after the Notre Dame/Indiana game. Notre Dame's national championship chances improve from 11.8% to 16%.
